page.title: 19Rolvenden's Clubs
page.content: There are many different clubs and organisations in Rolvenden. The{Gardening Society}holds Spring, Summer and Autumn Shows and organises outings and social evenings throughout the year. National organisations, like the{Royal British Legion}and{Women's {Institute} have braches in Rolvenden and charities like{NSPCC}and{Barnardos are well-supported by local groups. {Rolvenden Men's Club} is a centre for social activity and indoor sport, especially{Table Tennis.}The{Cricket {Club}and{Tennis Club}are the other sports clubs in the village. There is a busy{Playgroup & Toddler {Group}using the Village Hall each week and the{1st Rolvenden Guides} meet there. The{Wives Group}has regular meetings and outings and the School Hall and Playing Field are used by { {Rolvenden School PTA}for social events
